TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi Label extends System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl

summary.span: 代表控制項的文字標籤，並支援便捷鍵。

span.span: Represents the text label for a control and provides support for access keys.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別提供存取金鑰 （也就是助憶鍵） 的功能和視覺的支援。This class provides both functional and visual support for access keys (also known as mnemonics). 它經常會用來啟用控制項的鍵盤快速存取，例如。It is frequently used to enable quick keyboard access to controls such as a . 若要將指派要，將應該在使用者按下便捷鍵時取得焦點之控制項的屬性。To assign a to a , set the property to the control that should get focus when the user presses the access key. 設定也會導致目標[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tlasharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]將標籤的文字作為目標控制項的名稱。Setting the target also causes [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tlasharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] to use the text of the label as the name of the targeted control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 協助工具](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/index.md)。For more information, see [Accessibility](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/index.md). 若要設定的存取金鑰之前, 加上底線的字元，應該是存取金鑰。To set the access key, add an underscore before the character that should be the access key. 如果您的內容有多個底線字元，只有第一個會轉換成便捷鍵;其他底線會顯示為一般文字。If your content has multiple underscore characters, only the first one is converted into an access key; the other underscores appear as normal text. 如果您想要轉換成的存取金鑰的底線字元不是第一個底線，用於任何底線前面的您想要轉換的兩個連續底線。If the underscore that you want converted to the access key is not the first underscore, use two consecutive underscores for any underscores that precede the one that you want to convert. 例如，下列程式碼包含的存取金鑰並將顯示為 _Hello**W**ogw:For example, the following code contains an access key and displays as _Hello**W**orld: ``` ``` 由於前面 H 底線是雙精度浮點數，W 鍵會註冊為便捷鍵。Because the underscore that precedes H is a double, the W key registers as the access key. 標籤不是可設定焦點，並不是定位停駐點。A label is not focusable, and it is not a tab stop. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 焦點概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md)。For details, see [Focus Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md). A是，這表示它可以包含任何類型 （例如字串、 影像或工作面板） 的單一物件。A is a , which means that it can contain a single object of any type (such as a string, an image, or a panel). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別。For more information, see the class. ## 自訂標籤控制項Customizing the Label Control 若要將相同的屬性設定套用至多個控制項，可使用屬性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 您可以修改預設，讓控制項的獨特的外觀。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 如需有關建立，請參閱 < [ 透過建立 ControlTemplate 自訂現有控制項的外觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的組件和狀態所特有，請參閱 < [Label 樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/label-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [Label Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/label-styles-and-templates.md). 此控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control's default style. 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值，當控制項出現在應用程式。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 預設樣式會決定由哪一個桌面佈景主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 預設 WPF 佈景主題](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). > [!NOTE] > 設定視覺化屬性只能影響該屬性是否都存在於控制項的預設範本，並設定使用。Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in control's default template and is set by using a . 您可以找到的視覺化屬性清單中的 「 變更視覺結構的控制項 」 一節[透過建立 ControlTemplate 自訂現有控制項的外觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立使用繫結來設定目標。The following example shows how to create a that uses a binding to set the target. [!code-xaml[LabelSnippet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/LabelSnippet/CS/Pane1.xaml#1)] 下列範例示範如何建立，具有便捷鍵，並支援文字換行。The following example shows how to create a that has an access key and supports text wrapping. [!code-xaml[LabelSnippet#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/LabelSnippet/CS/Pane1.xaml#4)]

summary.span: 提供這個控制項的適當 實作，做為 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基礎結構的一部分。

summary.span: 取得或設定可在使用者按下標籤便捷鍵時接收焦點的項目。

span.span: Gets or sets the element that receives focus when the user presses the label's access key.

value.span: 會在使用者按下便捷鍵時接收焦點。

span.span: The that receives focus when the user presses the access key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以提供項目不支援所提供的存取金鑰的鍵盤快速鍵便捷鍵和設定這個屬性。You can provide keyboard shortcuts to elements that don't support access keys by giving a an access key and setting this property. 指派到某個標籤便捷鍵加上底線做為便捷鍵字元正前方。Assign an access key to a label by placing an underscore immediately before the character that acts as the access key. 可以在中指定的存取金鑰屬性或藉由設定到物件。An access key can be specified in the property or by setting to an object. 您無法使用這個屬性來定義。You cannot use this property to define a . 例如，下列是編譯，但正常運作： ``。For example, the following compiles but is not functional: ``. 這個屬性會提供您的應用程式中已定義的項目參考。This property provides a reference to an element that is already defined in your application. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 屬性項目用法XAML Property Element Usage ## XAML 值XAML Values `nameOfExistingElement` 名稱在按下便捷鍵時接收焦點。The name of that receives focus when the access key is pressed. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何設定 的 屬性。The following example shows how to set the property of a . [!code-xaml[LabelSnippet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/LabelSnippet/CS/Pane1.xaml#1)]
